description: building outline and design carved on flat silver side; "ADMINISTRATION BLDG COLUMBIAN EXPOSITION" near bottom edge of this side; "1492 to 1892" is cast into the door; back side black color protrudes out; combination lock on bottom
inscription:
Inscription and Stickers

On silver side near and on bottom edge in relief: [1492 / 1892 / ADMINISTRATION BLDG COLUMBIAN EXPOSITION]; on back side near bottom edge in relief: [Magic / BANK / INTRODUCTION (?) / PATENT PENDING]
markings: on back side, near bottom edge of left side on sticker 1: [# 6 1-17 / \"Columbian Magic Savings Bank\" / 6570 200 / 4160]; on bottom on sticker 2: [Combination / 8 and 4]
title: "Columbian Magic Savings Bank" mechanical bank
